TypeScript Examples

Log to screen

console.log("Hello World!");

Array For Loop

let arr = [1, 2, 3, 4, 5];

for (let i = 0; i < arr.length; i++) {
  console.log(arr[i]);
}

Function with return value

function add(a: number, b: number): number {
    return a + b;
}

const result: number = add(2, 3);
console.log(result); ## Output: 5

Create an object from an interface and print a value

type Person = {
    name: string;
    age: number;

};

const person: Person = {
    name: 'John Doe',
    age: 30,

};

console.log(person.name);

Loop through an array of strings and echo each one

const names: string[] = ['John', 'Jane', 'Jim'];

for (const name of names) {
  console.log(name);
}
